title: National Mental Health Programme (NMHP)
description: Provides affordable and accessible mental health care services through District Mental Health Programmes.
eligibility: All Indian citizens in need of mental health support.

title: Kiran Mental Health Helpline
description: 24x7 toll-free mental health rehabilitation helpline offering emotional support and suicide prevention counselling.
eligibility: Open to all individuals in emotional distress.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY) - Mental Health Coverage
description: Provides free treatment for selected mental health conditions under Ayushman Bharat scheme.
eligibility: Poor and vulnerable families as per SECC data.

title: Disaster Relief Assistance - NDMA
description: Government-provided financial and rehabilitation support for people affected by natural disasters.
eligibility: Individuals and families affected by disasters as identified by local authorities.

title: One Stop Centres (OSC) Scheme
description: Provides integrated support and assistance to women affected by violence, including counselling and medical aid.
eligibility: Women affected by violence or in distress.

title: Manodarpan Initiative
description: Psychosocial support for students, teachers, and families during COVID-19 and other crises.

title: Saksham - Disability Rehabilitation Scheme
description: Financial assistance for NGOs providing mental and physical rehabilitation services.
eligibility: Registered NGOs working in the disability sector.

title: State-Level Psychological Counselling Schemes
description: Various state governments offer free counselling services through mental health centres.

title: Helpline 112 - Emergency Support
description: Pan-India emergency helpline number for police, medical, fire, and disaster services.
eligibility: Available to all citizens in emergencies.

title: Childline 1098
description: 24x7 helpline for children in distress offering rescue, counselling, and shelter support.
eligibility: All children in distress or at risk.
